sections.general:
PRODUCT MARKETING MANAGER
Professional Summary
Seasoned omni-channel professional skilled at collaborating with multiple stakeholders to determine audience interest and develop strategic go-to-
market plans that align with the company's business priorities and initiatives.
Core Qualifications
Excellent Communicator Influential Leader
Problem Solver Metrics SavvyÂ Â
Highly Organized High Productivity
Collaborative Team Player
